about_the_game:
THERE’S SOMETHING WRONG WITH… is a short video game.

Explore


It’s a first-person horror experience set in the eerie and enigmatic tunnels.
As players navigate through dark passages, they will discover notes, interactive objects, and unusual human remains.

The creature


However, not everything within those tunnels is lifeless. Players will encounter a dangerous creature.

Replicator


The game does not feature a traditional Inventory system. By using a special tool called the Replicator, players will be able to copy specific elements of the environment and paste them onto other unique areas.

Hide


The monster cannot be defeated or even harmed. The only viable approach will be to rely on stealth and hiding tactics.



The main story can conclude with three different endings.

THE STORY


A man wakes up in the forest, with no memory of how he ended up there. He is lost. Confused. Scared. And completely alone.

He recalls that once again, he had a vision of a mysterious entrance. The haunting image of this entrance lingers in his mind with every blackout.

As the man wanders through the woods in search of a way out, he eventually enters the tunnels. What he discovers within the dark and mysterious passages will change his life forever...

name: There's something wrong with...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 290
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Short first-person horror experience where you navigate through dark tunnels, hide from a monstrous entity, and uncover the biggest secret of your life.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
